summary: Now you can buy high leveled items such as master robes and strong staffs from court wizards and spell shops.
descriptionHtml:
In vanilla game court wizards sell items according the player level.
they sell they strong items when player's level goes up.
This Mod will allow you buy high leveled items such as master robes and strong staffs from court wizards and spell shops all around Skyrim.
Now you can spend your money for better things.

Manual Installation:
Copy *.esp file(s) in your skyrim "Data" folder.
There is a Summermyst patch. If You installed Summermyst Enchantments, Use This Patch too. This patch must be loaded after original file.
enjoy!

My other UnLeveled mods:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/93165]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/93165[/url]﻿ is UnLeveled Alchemists.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/93080]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/93080[/url]﻿ is UnLeveled Blacksmiths.
author: hr75
